root: ^With the festival and the knights here, a very little.
^The knights are taking over our job, so why don't we enjoy the festival?
^You say that because you have yet to see much action, trust me, this is the perfect time.
^Ha! Says the one who has been sleeping all day!
^That aside, he has a point, with the Holy Garlic here I don't think anything bad could happen.
^It is exactly because its here that-
^Alright, we will deal with the stranglers. Keep them from getting to the houses.
